resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106470</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106470</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Building Stones of Maryland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bausteine von Maryland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pierres de bâtiment du Maryland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pedras de edifício de Maryland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pietre da costruzione di Maryland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέτρες κτηρίου της Μέρυλαντ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piedras de edificio de Maryland</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article written for the Maryland Geological Survey discusses the most common stones produced in Maryland quarries. Descriptions of the stones include, not only geologic explanations, but also their history and famous places in which the stones are used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der für die Maryland geologische 
Übersicht geschrieben wird, behandelt die geläufigsten Steine, die 
in den Maryland Steinbrüchen produziert werden. Beschreibungen 
der Steine schließen, nicht nur geologische Erklärungen, aber auch 
ihre Geschichte und berühmten Plätze ein, in denen die Steine 
benutzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article écrit pour l'enquête géologique du 
Maryland discute les pierres les plus communes produites dans des 
carrières du Maryland. Les descriptions des pierres incluent, 
non seulement des explications géologiques, mais également leur 
histoire et endroits célèbres dans lesquels les pierres sont 
utilisées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo escrito para o exame geological de 
Maryland discute as pedras as mais comuns produzidas em quarries de 
Maryland. As descrições das pedras incluem, não somente 
explanações geologic, mas também seus history e lugares famosos em 
que as pedras são usadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo scritto per l'indagine geologica 
del Maryland discute le pietre più comuni prodotte nelle cave del 
Maryland. Le descrizioni delle pietre includono, non soltanto 
spiegazioni geologiche, ma anche la loro storia e posti famosi in cui 
le pietre sono usate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο που γράφεται για τη γεωλογική έρευνα 
της Μέρυλαντ συζητά τις πιό κοινές πέτρες που παράγονται στα 
λατομεία της Μέρυλαντ. Οι περιγραφές των πετρών 
περιλαμβάνουν, όχι μόνο γεωλογικές εξηγήσεις, αλλά και διάσημων
θέσεις τους οι ιστορίας και στις οποίες οι πέτρες 
χρησιμοποιούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo escrito para la encuesta sobre 
geológica Maryland discute las piedras más comunes producidas en las
minas de Maryland. Las descripciones de las piedras incluyen, no
solamente las explicaciones geológicas, pero también su historia y 
lugares famosos en los cuales se utilicen las piedras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106470</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/building-stones-of-maryland</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
